value:
$WmMPID_比翼シャロン,ch00_01_Alfons_MF_Pair,Face|Oh my goodness... Alfonse...
My stomach! It's sooo full!$k$p$nMPID_比翼アルフォンス|Well, I did warn you not to eat
so much, didn't I?$k$p$nMPID_比翼シャロン|But...New Year's celebrations always
have heaps and heaps of delicious
food... What was I supposed to do?!$k$pOof... I feel like I'm going to burst!$k$p$WmMPID_年明キヌ,ch05_47_Kinu_F_NewYear20,Face|Same here! We both ate so much,
I'm not sure who put away more!
Urp... I don't feel so good...$k$p$WmMPID_年明レテ,ch11_11_Rethe_F_NewYear20,Face|...These outfits are nice and all, but
would anyone mind if I changed
clothes already? It's...a bit tight.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_MF_Pair,Face|Wow. You too, Lethe?$k$p$WmMPID_年明エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_NewYear20,Face|I feel perfectly fine, but...I suppose
I didn't eat quite as much as you all.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼シャロン,ch00_01_Alfons_MF_Pair,Face|Ugh... If we could just burn all this
off—or at least digest it... But how?$k$p$WmMPID_年明アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_NewYear20,Face|Listen up, everyone! Sorry to
interrupt the New Year's festivities,
but something has come up!$k$pAs much as I hate to send anyone
out onto the battlefield in the middle
of a celebration...$k$p$WmMPID_比翼シャロン,ch00_01_Alfons_MF_Pair,Face|Oh! That sort of physical activity may
be just what I need to work through
all this food... Count me in!$k$p$WmMPID_年明キヌ,ch05_47_Kinu_F_NewYear20,Face|Me too! No better way to boost
digestion than a nice battle!$k$p$WmMPID_年明レテ,ch11_11_Rethe_F_NewYear20,Face|I'll join too! Can't let everyone else
hog all the glory just because I've
eaten a good meal, can I?!$k$p$WmMPID_年明アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_NewYear20,Face|Whoa! I didn't expect you all to be
so fired up! What happened? Was it
something you ate?$k$p

$WmMPID_比翼シャロン,ch00_01_Alfons_MF_Pair,Face|We did it! The strange vortex thing
is fading away!$k$p$nMPID_比翼アルフォンス|Then that's all taken care of. Thank
you for all your help, everyone.$k$p$WmMPID_年明キヌ,ch05_47_Kinu_F_NewYear20,Face|It was nothin'! Besides, all that
moving around settled all the grub
in my tummy. So thank YOU!$k$p$WmMPID_年明レテ,ch11_11_Rethe_F_NewYear20,Face|This getup doesn't feel quite so tight
anymore—it's a bit easier to move in
now. It's actually...kind of pleasant.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_MF_Pair,Face|Yes, well...the fact that you're all
feeling better is what matters most.$k$p$WmMPID_年明エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_NewYear20,Face|Yes...$k$p$WmMPID_比翼シャロン,ch00_01_Alfons_MF_Pair,Face|Whew! With all that fighting, I seem
to have worked up a whole new
appetite! Let's get back and dig in!$k$p$WmMPID_年明キヌ,ch05_47_Kinu_F_NewYear20,Face|Don't have to tell me twice!$k$p$WmMPID_年明レテ,ch11_11_Rethe_F_NewYear20,Face|Yeah, not a bad idea, actually...$k$p$WmMPID_比翼アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_MF_Pair,Face|Wait—what?! But I thought—$k$p$nMPID_比翼シャロン|Hurry up, Brother! All those New
Year's dishes aren't going to eat
themselves, you know!$k$p$nMPID_比翼アルフォンス|Hm. Never a dull moment, I suppose!
Here's to another interesting year...$k$p
